hints.content:
##Trapezoid

A trapezoid is a quadrilateral that has exactly one pair of parallel sides.

[[☃ explanation 1]]

options.explanation: ![A shape with 4 sides. One pair of sides are parallel.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/91457d14f1d0daa5d739b9905502b534871780ce)  ![A shape with 4 sides. One pair of sides are parallel.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8201f7e18fc16965d4ec915c88d188963853445d)
options.showPrompt: Show me examples of trapezoids, please.

hints.content: Which of the shapes is a quadrilateral with exactly one pair of parallel sides?

The following shapes are trapezoids:
